author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS OVER THE CENTRAL ATLANTIC...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS OVER THE CENTRAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 AM AST Wed Sep 17 the center of Seven was located near 13.7, -45.9 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS OVER THE CENTRAL ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 AM AST Wed Sep 17 the center of Seven was located near 13.7, -45.9 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Seven (AT2/AL072025)
